entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Greater Napanee
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:08 a.m. EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of drizzle. High 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of drizzle early this afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h. High 9. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain overnight with risk of freezing rain. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A few showers. High 9.
entry.summary: Rain showers. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Risk of a thunderstorm late in the morning and in the afternoon. Local rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 9. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
